export const ShowTask = ({}) => { const tasks =[ {id: 1001, name:"Task A", time: "2:09:01 AM 9/14/2030" }, {id: 1002, name:"Task B", time: "2:09:01 AM 9/14/2030" }, {id: 1003, name:"Task C", time: "2:09:01 AM 9/14/2030" }, ] return (
